info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 6:52AM CDT until August 10 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Wisconsin, including the following county, Dane.
* WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying, flood prone roads and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Madison, Fitchburg, Middleton, Verona, McFarland, Monona, Shorewood Hills, Maple Bluff, Henry Vilas Zoo, Camp Randall Stadium and UW-Madison. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING
